name: Terminal Divide
description:
Terminal Divide is a cyberpunk dungeon crawler where you fight in both meatspace and cyberspace.

Attack the nameless company and their faceless goons, hunt for the data caches to reveal their secrets, and make your way to the exit. Use cyberspace to bypass security, lock downs, and other problems.

Made for the Dungeon Crawler games jam 2023 in 7 days.

The theme: "Duality". So I chose the duality of worlds with meatspace and cyberspace, divided by the computer terminal. There's also the duality between the powers that be and those who challenge them that's fundamental to the cyberpunk genre, which can also often be terminal and does divide people.

Controls

Movement: WASD or ARROWS

Turning: Q and E

Shoot: SPACE

Reload: R

Weapon select: 1, 2, 3

Toggle cyberspace: C

Interact: Z

Credits
